fulltext:
EXPERIENCE
TECHNOLOGY ONE - TMA SOLUTIONS
Backend Developer
2016- 2019 
I worked for the TechnologyOne team - a comprehensive 
platform providing Enterprise Software solutions and 
services that transform business and make life simple 
for the customers.
- 3+ years practical experience on a web-based 
application.
- Good understanding and experience in working in an 
agile team. 
- Experience in project management software: JIRA.
- Experience in version control system such as Git, TFS.
- Experience in working with CI system such as TeamCity.
- Experience in communication with client in English.
- Ability to mentoring newcomers and do code review for 
team members. 
- Ability to follow, maintain and lead the team on strict 
coding standards.
TIN NGUYEN
BACKEND DEVELOPER
ABOUT ME
I’m an experienced backend developer 
with a solid background in web 
development using .Net framework. My 
business domain is mainly in enterprise 
software (Student management, property 
and rating...).
Responsible, passionate and able to work 
under pressure. I’m looking forward to 
honing and develop my skills in order to 
become more complete and can utlize my 
knowledge efficiently for the growth of 
the organization.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Microsoft technologies
Proficient in use of C#, .Net Framework, Entity 
Framework.
Intermediate level of HTML, CSS, Javascript, ...
Frontend technologies
SQL Server and Oracle.
Relational databases
Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, JetBrain Rider
IDE
Tools
Command Shell, Bitbucket, SourceTree, TeamCity, Jira, 
Confluence, - Amazon Workspace, Resharper, OneNote...
MsTest, NUnit.
Unit tests
Practices
Design Patterns, Dependency Injection, Continuous 
Integration, Unit Testing, Code Review
CONTACT
Address: 
24/7 Le Thi Hong, Go Vap, HCMC
Phone: 
(+84) 386 596 455
Email: 
 hoangtin1514 @gmail.com
EDUCATION
University of Science
BACHELOR OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY 
SPECIALIZED SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
2013 - 2017
GPA 7.5
ACHIEVEMENTS
PERFORMANCE APPRAISAL LEVEL 5
2017
It's the highest level of the yearly employee 
assessment at TMA. 
INTERNAL HACKDAY FIRST FRIZE
2017
The event held by the customer
to collect innovation ideas 
to improve the product.
TMA QUARTERLY STAR PERFORMER
2019
HOBBIES
Music
Bowling pins
Cycling
Photography
